Title: Rake
Writer: Peter Duncan, Richard Roxburgh, Charles Waterstreet
Actors: Richard Roxburgh, Adrienne Pickering, Caroline Brazier, Danielle Cormack, Russell Dykstra, Matt Day
Plot: Criminal lawyer Cleaver Greene defends the indefensible - from bigamists to cannibals and everything in between. He is champion of the lost cause, both in the court room and in the bedroom.
